title: About Us - DoFor Event | Premium Event Management Company
content:
Crafting unforgettable experiences since 2010 Welcome to DoFor Event, where every occasion becomes a cherished memory. We are your premier
                        partner in crafting unforgettable experiences, meticulously designed to reflect your vision and
                        exceed your expectations. At DoFor Event, we understand that every event is unique, deserving of dedicated attention to
                        detail and personalized care. With a blend of creativity, professionalism, and passion, we
                        specialize in curating bespoke events tailored to your preferences, whether it's a lavish
                        wedding, a corporate gala, a milestone celebration, or a themed extravaganza. Based in Delhi, we operate across India, bringing world-class event management services to
                        clients nationwide. To transform your vision into reality by delivering exceptional, personalized event experiences
                        that create lasting memories. We strive to exceed expectations through creativity, innovation,
                        and unwavering commitment to excellence.

faqs.question: How much does About Us - DoFor Event cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing varies based on guest count, venue, and package selected. Basic packages start from ₹30,000 and can go up to ₹50,00,000+ for luxury events. Contact us for a detailed quote.

faqs.question: How far in advance should I book?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking 2-3 months in advance for regular events and 6+ months for peak season (Nov-Feb, wedding season). However, we can accommodate last-minute bookings based on availability.

faqs.question: Which cities do you operate in?
faqs.answer: We provide About Us - DoFor Event services across India, with primary operations in Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Goa, Jaipur, Udaipur, Pune, and Hyderabad. We also handle destination events.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations made 30+ days before the event: 80% refund. 15-30 days: 50% refund. Less than 15 days: No refund. Rescheduling is allowed once without charges if done 30+ days in advance.

faqs.question: What payment terms do you offer?
faqs.answer: We require 30% advance at booking, 40% one month before the event, and 30% on the event day. We accept bank transfer, cheque, and online payments.

faqs.question: Can I customize the packages?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! All our packages are fully customizable. You can add or remove services, choose specific vendors, and tailor everything to your preferences and budget.

faqs.question: Do you provide decoration services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete decoration services including theme-based decor, floral arrangements, lighting, stage setup, and more. Our in-house design team will work with you to create your dream setup.

faqs.question: What if it rains during an outdoor event?
faqs.answer: We always have a backup plan for outdoor events, including weather-proof tents, covered areas, and alternative indoor arrangements. This is discussed during planning.

faqs.question: Do you handle vendor coordination?
faqs.answer: Yes, we coordinate with all vendors including caterers, decorators, photographers, entertainers, and more. You'll have a dedicated event manager as your single point of contact.

faqs.question: Can I see your previous work?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have an extensive portfolio of past events. Contact us and we'll share photos, videos, and client testimonials relevant to your event type.

faqs.question: What is included in the basic package?
faqs.answer: Basic package typically includes venue decoration, standard catering (veg menu), sound system, basic photography, and event coordination. Exact inclusions vary by service type.

faqs.question: Do you provide catering services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete catering services with multi-cuisine options (Indian, Continental, Chinese, etc.), both vegetarian and non-vegetarian. We can accommodate dietary restrictions and preferences.

testimonials.review: DoFor Event made our dream wedding come true! Every detail was perfect, from the decoration to the food. Highly recommended!
Professional, organized, and flawless execution. Our 500+ attendee conference was a huge success thanks to DoFor Event.
Amazing theme party for my daughter's birthday! The team was creative, punctual, and made sure every kid had a blast.

faqs.question: How much does Dealers & Retailer Meet Events cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing varies based on guest count, venue, and package selected. Basic packages start from ₹30,000 and can go up to ₹50,00,000+ for luxury events. Contact us for a detailed quote.

faqs.question: How far in advance should I book?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking 2-3 months in advance for regular events and 6+ months for peak season (Nov-Feb, wedding season). However, we can accommodate last-minute bookings based on availability.

faqs.question: Which cities do you operate in?
faqs.answer: We provide Dealers & Retailer Meet Events services across India, with primary operations in Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Goa, Jaipur, Udaipur, Pune, and Hyderabad. We also handle destination events.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations made 30+ days before the event: 80% refund. 15-30 days: 50% refund. Less than 15 days: No refund. Rescheduling is allowed once without charges if done 30+ days in advance.

faqs.question: What payment terms do you offer?
faqs.answer: We require 30% advance at booking, 40% one month before the event, and 30% on the event day. We accept bank transfer, cheque, and online payments.

faqs.question: Can I customize the packages?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! All our packages are fully customizable. You can add or remove services, choose specific vendors, and tailor everything to your preferences and budget.

faqs.question: Do you provide decoration services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete decoration services including theme-based decor, floral arrangements, lighting, stage setup, and more. Our in-house design team will work with you to create your dream setup.

faqs.question: What if it rains during an outdoor event?
faqs.answer: We always have a backup plan for outdoor events, including weather-proof tents, covered areas, and alternative indoor arrangements. This is discussed during planning.

faqs.question: Do you handle vendor coordination?
faqs.answer: Yes, we coordinate with all vendors including caterers, decorators, photographers, entertainers, and more. You'll have a dedicated event manager as your single point of contact.

faqs.question: Can I see your previous work?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have an extensive portfolio of past events. Contact us and we'll share photos, videos, and client testimonials relevant to your event type.

faqs.question: What is included in the basic package?
faqs.answer: Basic package typically includes venue decoration, standard catering (veg menu), sound system, basic photography, and event coordination. Exact inclusions vary by service type.

faqs.question: Do you provide catering services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete catering services with multi-cuisine options (Indian, Continental, Chinese, etc.), both vegetarian and non-vegetarian. We can accommodate dietary restrictions and preferences.

title: Luxury Wedding | DoFor Event
headings: Why Choose Us for Luxury Weddings?
content:
Royal celebrations with opulent grandeur At DoFor Event, we craft extraordinary luxury weddings that reflect your refined taste and create
                        unforgettable royal experiences. Your luxury wedding deserves perfection in every detail. We deliver excellence beyond
                        expectations. Weddings fit for royalty Choose your level of opulence

faqs.question: How much does Luxury Wedding cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing varies based on guest count, venue, and package selected. Basic packages start from ₹30,000 and can go up to ₹50,00,000+ for luxury events. Contact us for a detailed quote.

faqs.question: How far in advance should I book?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking 2-3 months in advance for regular events and 6+ months for peak season (Nov-Feb, wedding season). However, we can accommodate last-minute bookings based on availability.

faqs.question: Which cities do you operate in?
faqs.answer: We provide Luxury Wedding services across India, with primary operations in Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Goa, Jaipur, Udaipur, Pune, and Hyderabad. We also handle destination events.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations made 30+ days before the event: 80% refund. 15-30 days: 50% refund. Less than 15 days: No refund. Rescheduling is allowed once without charges if done 30+ days in advance.

faqs.question: What payment terms do you offer?
faqs.answer: We require 30% advance at booking, 40% one month before the event, and 30% on the event day. We accept bank transfer, cheque, and online payments.

faqs.question: Can I customize the packages?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! All our packages are fully customizable. You can add or remove services, choose specific vendors, and tailor everything to your preferences and budget.

faqs.question: Do you provide decoration services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete decoration services including theme-based decor, floral arrangements, lighting, stage setup, and more. Our in-house design team will work with you to create your dream setup.

faqs.question: What if it rains during an outdoor event?
faqs.answer: We always have a backup plan for outdoor events, including weather-proof tents, covered areas, and alternative indoor arrangements. This is discussed during planning.

faqs.question: Do you handle vendor coordination?
faqs.answer: Yes, we coordinate with all vendors including caterers, decorators, photographers, entertainers, and more. You'll have a dedicated event manager as your single point of contact.

faqs.question: Can I see your previous work?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have an extensive portfolio of past events. Contact us and we'll share photos, videos, and client testimonials relevant to your event type.

faqs.question: What is included in the basic package?
faqs.answer: Basic package typically includes venue decoration, standard catering (veg menu), sound system, basic photography, and event coordination. Exact inclusions vary by service type.

faqs.question: Do you provide catering services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete catering services with multi-cuisine options (Indian, Continental, Chinese, etc.), both vegetarian and non-vegetarian. We can accommodate dietary restrictions and preferences.

title: Diwali Celebrations | DoFor Event
content:
Festival of lights & prosperity At DoFor Event, we create magical Diwali celebrations that illuminate hearts with joy, tradition,
                        and festive splendor. Diwali is the festival of lights. We bring traditional charm with modern elegance to your
                        celebration. Illuminating celebrations Choose your festive package

faqs.question: How much does Diwali Celebrations cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing varies based on guest count, venue, and package selected. Basic packages start from ₹30,000 and can go up to ₹50,00,000+ for luxury events. Contact us for a detailed quote.

faqs.question: How far in advance should I book?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking 2-3 months in advance for regular events and 6+ months for peak season (Nov-Feb, wedding season). However, we can accommodate last-minute bookings based on availability.

faqs.question: Which cities do you operate in?
faqs.answer: We provide Diwali Celebrations services across India, with primary operations in Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Goa, Jaipur, Udaipur, Pune, and Hyderabad. We also handle destination events.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations made 30+ days before the event: 80% refund. 15-30 days: 50% refund. Less than 15 days: No refund. Rescheduling is allowed once without charges if done 30+ days in advance.

faqs.question: What payment terms do you offer?
faqs.answer: We require 30% advance at booking, 40% one month before the event, and 30% on the event day. We accept bank transfer, cheque, and online payments.

faqs.question: Can I customize the packages?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! All our packages are fully customizable. You can add or remove services, choose specific vendors, and tailor everything to your preferences and budget.

faqs.question: Do you provide decoration services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete decoration services including theme-based decor, floral arrangements, lighting, stage setup, and more. Our in-house design team will work with you to create your dream setup.

faqs.question: What if it rains during an outdoor event?
faqs.answer: We always have a backup plan for outdoor events, including weather-proof tents, covered areas, and alternative indoor arrangements. This is discussed during planning.

faqs.question: Do you handle vendor coordination?
faqs.answer: Yes, we coordinate with all vendors including caterers, decorators, photographers, entertainers, and more. You'll have a dedicated event manager as your single point of contact.

faqs.question: Can I see your previous work?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have an extensive portfolio of past events. Contact us and we'll share photos, videos, and client testimonials relevant to your event type.

faqs.question: What is included in the basic package?
faqs.answer: Basic package typically includes venue decoration, standard catering (veg menu), sound system, basic photography, and event coordination. Exact inclusions vary by service type.

faqs.question: Do you provide catering services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete catering services with multi-cuisine options (Indian, Continental, Chinese, etc.), both vegetarian and non-vegetarian. We can accommodate dietary restrictions and preferences.
